title: Content Creator Job at Wetinuneed Services Limited
content:
Wetinuneed Services Limited is a first of its kind 100% indigenous on-line advertising company proudly founded, owned and managed by Nigerians for Nigerians. Our aim is to become Nigeria’s No.1 advertising platform by providing a next to none service that will not only exceed the advertising expectations of the Nigerian market but subsequently exceed the expectations of advertisers in the sub-Saharan region.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator
Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking an experienced, creative, and passionate Content Creator with strong storytelling and videography skills to craft engaging content and amplify our brand voice. If you are a talented wordsmith and videographer, we would love to hear from you!


What You Will Do


	Video Production: Ability to plan, shoot, and edit high-quality videos and reels for multiple platforms.
	Photography: Skilled in capturing and editing compelling images that align with brand aesthetics.
	Writing & Copywriting: Strong command of grammar and the ability to craft clear, persuasive, and engaging content tailored for various audiences and platforms.
	Storytelling: A natural storyteller who can shape brand narratives and communicate messages effectively through different media.
	On-Camera Presence: Confident, charismatic, and articulate when hosting or presenting on video or during live streams.
	Audio Content Creation: Familiarity with voiceovers, podcasts, or sound editing to support multimedia projects.
	SEO Knowledge: Understanding of search engine optimization techniques to improve content visibility and ranking.
	Content Strategy: Ability to plan and execute content calendars aligned with brand goals and audience engagement.


Qualifications & Skills


	Education: Bachelor’s degree in Communications, English, Journalism, Marketing, or related fields.
	Experience: Proven track record as a Content Creator, with samples of engaging, high-impact content.
	Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
	Strong storytelling ability to connect with diverse audiences.
	Detail-oriented, organized, and deadline-driven.
	Knowledge of social media and content trends.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: wetinuneedng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Inventory Officer (Male or Female) Job at Prince OJ Global Services Limited
content:
Prince OJ Global Services Limited is a fast consumer goods company incorporated in Nigeria with head office in Onitsha Anambra state, We deal on importation and distribution of top quality wines and spirits, spices, tomato, spaghetti, oil, margarine, baking powder, liquid milk and many more...

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer (Male or Female)

Job Location: Onitsha, Anambra
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Record and keep accurate information on stock
	Overseeing daily/weekly/monthly updating of stock movement
	Ensure that warehouse staff are up to date with their records (book)
	Prompt distribution of products to branches and outlets as requested.
	Ensure periodic stock-taking and submission of stock reconciliation report
	•Safeguard the warehouses
	Ensure there is no damage of products arising from personal handling.
	Provide stock reports as and at when needed
	Monitoring of sales of products through branch stock report before releasing products
	Monitor stock level to avoid over stocking or shortages
	Ensure products are picked up for delivery to branches as at when due.
	Training - Provide training and understanding to various departments regarding stock control.
	Other ad hoc projects relating to stock and system management.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Degree in a related field
	At least 1 year of experience
	Must be computer literate
	Excellent communication skills, both oral and verbal
	Great interpersonal skills
	Customer service and relationship-building skills
	Teamworking skills
	Strong attention to details
	Analytical Skills.


Salary
N70,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@ojglobalservices.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Accounting Manager Job at Moniepoint
content:
Moniepoint Incorporated is a global business payments and banking platform and recently became QED Investors’ first investment in Africa. We are the partner of choice for over 600,000 businesses of all sizes, powering the dreams of SMBs and providing them with equal access to the tools they need to grow and scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounting Manager

Job Location: Nigeria (Remote)

About the role
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	In this role, you will manage accounting operations focusing on holding company and consolidated entity reporting.
	You will help manage the company’s global accounting operations, focusing on consolidations, intercompany transactions, and accurate reporting of shared costs across regions.


Responsibilities


	Perform monthly, quarterly, and annual financial close processes, ensuring timely and accurate consolidation
	Manage intercompany transactions, reconciliations, and eliminations, ensuring alignment with the holding company’s financial reporting requirements.
	Prepare consolidated financial statements and ensure compliance with IFRS and local statutory requirements.
	Collaborate with finance operations to implement efficient intercompany transactions and reconciliations
	Support audit processes and ensure compliance with internal controls for holding company
	Ensure compliance with statutory requirements
	Drive efficient systems and processing for entity accounting operations
	Experience working with companies operating within the UK financial and regulatory landscape is essential
	Demonstrable expertise in UK financial regulations and tax compliance, including VAT, corporate tax, and payroll.


What we can offer you


	Culture - We put our people first and prioritize the well-being of every team member. We’ve built a company where all opinions carry weight and where all voices are heard. We value and respect each other and always look out for one another. Above all, we are human.
	Learning - We have a learning and development-focused environment with an emphasis on knowledge sharing, training, and regular internal technical talks.
	Compensation - You’ll receive an attractive salary, pension, health insurance, annual bonus, plus other benefits.


What to expect in the hiring process


	A preliminary phone call with one of our recruiters.
	Take home assessment
	A panel technical interview with existing Directors of Product Management and Business Leaders.
	A behavioural and technical interview with a member of the Executive team.

title: Content Creator Job at First Excelsia Professional Services Limited
content:
First Excelsia Professional Services Limited - Our client, a full-service Construction firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator
Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Construction / Engineering

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and execute a content strategy aligned with marketing goals and brand voice.
	Create engaging and informative written, visual, and video content related to construction projects, trends, and services.
	Work closely with project managers, engineers, and site teams to gather insights and translate them into accessible content.
	Manage content calendars and ensure timely delivery of campaigns.
	Optimize content for SEO and audience engagement.
	Capture on-site photos and videos of projects in progress and completed works.
	Monitor and analyze content performance metrics and adjust strategies as needed.


Person Specification


	Bachelor’s degree in mass communication or relevant field of study.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Content Creator, Copywriter, or similar role in the construction or related industry.
	Strong writing, editing, and storytelling skills.
	Proficiency in content creation tools (Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
	Knowledge of SEO and social media marketing strategies.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio to: alentsearch@firstexcelsia.com using "Content Creator" as the subject of the email.
